Docs.param: The value to use for Claim.Type when creating a Claim.
The top level key to look for in the json user data.
Docs.summary: Selects a top level value from the json user data with the given key name and adds it as a Claim. This no-ops if the ClaimsIdentity already contains a Claim with the given ClaimType. This no-ops if the key is not found or the value is empty.

The value to use for Claim.ValueType when creating a Claim.
Docs.summary: Selects a top level value from the json user data with the given key name and adds it as a Claim. This no-ops if the ClaimsIdentity already contains a Claim with the given ClaimType. This no-ops if the key is not found or the value is empty.
